effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
